means.word_mean: 宽度,广度,直径,伸展,部分

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from wide + -th, on the pattern of breadth (replacing wideness)

encyclopedia.content: 概念 WIDTH，即表示布林线开口大小的指标。利用布林线指标选股，主要是观察布林线指标开口的大小，对那些开口逐渐变小的股票就要多加留意了。因为布林线指标开口逐渐变小代表股价的涨跌幅度逐渐变小，多空双方力量趋于一致，股价将会选择方向突破。而开口越小，股价突破的力度就越大。那么，到底开口多小才算小，这就需要用到WIDTH指标了。应用法则 1.极限宽主要的作用在于辅助布林线搜索即将发动行情的个股； 2.极限宽的极限数据

entry.def: The width of something is the distance it measures from one side or edge to the other.

example.ex: Measure the full width of the window...
The road was reduced to 18ft in width by adding parking bays...
example.tran: 这条路增加了停车区后宽度缩减到了18英尺。

entry.def: The width of something is its quality of being wide.

example.ex: The best utensil for steaming is a wok because its width easily accommodates a whole fish.
example.tran: 锅是蒸鱼的最好器具，因为它很宽，可以轻松放下一整条鱼。

entry.def: A width is the distance from one side of a swimming pool to the other.

means.word_mean: 1. the extent of something from side to side
